Constructor Detail

Alarm

public Alarm(AlarmTask alarmTask,
             double threshold,
             boolean greater)
Default constructor

Parameters:
alarmTask - the task to execute in case the alarm has to go off.
threshold - the alarm threshold.
greater - if true the alarm is raised if the input value is greater than the thresold, if false the alarm is raised for values below the threshold.
Method Detail

setThreshold

public void setThreshold(double newThreshold)
Sets the alarm threshold. This method is usefull when the alarm threshold can change during the application lifetime.

Parameters:
newThreshold - the new threshold for the alarm.

setLap

void setLap(Lap lap)
Sets the lap associated with the alarm.

Parameters:
lap - the lap to associate with the alarm

getLap

public Lap getLap()
Returns the lap associated with the alarm.

Returns:
the alarm's Lap.

getThreshold

public double getThreshold()
Returns the alarm's threshold.

Returns:
the alarm's threshold

check

public boolean check(double value)
Checks if the alarm has to be raised.

Parameters:
value - input value to check agains the thresold.
Returns:
true if the alarm has been raised and the alarm task has been called.
